house_listing.house_description: Waterfront Beauty! Wood Floors in Dining Room, Living Room, & Master Bedroom. Tile flooring in the kitchen, breakfast room, master bath, and utility. Island kitchen with lots of cabinet space that any cook will enjoy! Open, light, brite, and almost a view of the water from all areas! Outside the home owner can enjoy their evenings from a tri-level deck that has malibu lights and leads to the boat slip. Upstairs their is a balcony that overlooks beautiful Lake Conroe! Beautiful landscaping and more! This is a must see!
